Deep Nourishing: This NIVEA body cream nourishes dry skin for visible radiance
Multi-Use: Creamy formula for dry skin is also perfect as a hand cream or a moisturizing foot cream
Great for Dry Skin: Body cream for dry skin leaves skin intensively hydrated, and radiant after just 1 application
Includes one (1) 16 ounce jar of NIVEA Cocoa Butter Body Cream with Deep Nourishing Serum
body.description: Relax, and pamper your skin with NIVEA Cocoa Butter Body Cream. This rich creamy formula is enriched with our Deep Nourishing Serum, Cocoa Butter and Vitamin E. It delivers intense moisture to dry skin for up to 48 hours, and leaves skin looking radiant and lightly scented after just one application. Treat yourself to a little extra care, you won’t regret it! NIVEA Cocoa Butter Body Cream with Deep Nourishing Serum nourishes dry skin for visible radiance. Simply apply this dry skin cream daily to leave skin feeling moisturized and radiant. NIVEA Cocoa Butter Body Cream can also be used as a moisturizing hand cream or foot cream. NIVEA is a trusted leader in skin care products, with more than 100 years of experience.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Does this body cream have multiple uses? NIVEA Cocoa Butter Body Cream is ideal for everyday use, and it can also be used as a moisturizing hand cream or foot cream. How often should I apply cream on dry skin? This Cocoa Butter Body Cream intensely moisturizes your skin for up to 48 hours, and leaves your skin looking hydrated and radiant after just one application daily. Does it help reduce stretch marks? The NIVEA Cocoa Butter Body Crème is a moisturizing body crème for dry to very dry skin. It has not been tested on stretch marks. What ingredients are in this body cream? You can find a full list of the ingredients in NIVEA Cocoa Butter Body Cream on the back of the jar and in the product images located at the top of this page. What is the difference between the Nivea Cocoa Butter Body Cream and the lotion? The body cream does feature some of the same ingredients as the lotion, but it also has its own unique combination of ingredients like Shea butter, Soybean Oil and Dimethicone, which helps to deliver a nourishing cream without a heavy, pasty feel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thick & Luxurious Cream at a Great Price 10 ⭐'s
reviews.reviewText: This is the 2nd best cream I've ever used. The BEST cream I ever used had the same consistency and smelled AMAZING. Unfortunately, it was discontinued a few years back so I’ve been on the lookout for a replacement, trying various brands until I found one I liked. I'm always concerned about buying creams online as I don't have the opportunity to smell them, and I don't like to smell like anything edible or stinky, nor do I like greasy creams.Because of the low price and great reviews, I decided to give this Nivea one a try. I thought it was going to smell like chocolate like my cocoa butter stick, but it didn’t. It has a very light, pleasant smell that dissipates quickly. It’s creamy and thick and quickly absorbs into the skin, and doesn’t feel or look greasy. It feels soooo luxurious (like an expensive cream) that it is a pleasure applying it. I wasn’t one before to put cream on my hands every time I washed them, but now I do because I love how it feels when I slather it on my skin. I love it so much that when I work from home I’ll apply it to my hands, neck, and face three or four times a day. The jar didn’t say not to apply it on my face so I hope it is safe cause everywhere I’ve applied it looks and feels AH-MAZING! My skin never felt so soft or looked better, and my skin doesn’t look as crepey anymore. 💯% recommend, and I hope you love it as much as me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Just one application immediately following a shower significantly improved my dry skin, which was due to winter dryness. The itching caused by the dryness disappeared right away. These results exceeded my expectations. The smell is neither disturbing nor overwhelming, and the texture is ideal. The bottle arrived sealed, which was a bonus. I purchased this amazing product based on all the great reviews, so I wanted to leave a comment in return.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very high quality product at a reasonable price! I love it.
reviews.reviewText: Very good body butter,not sticky like some are. It goes on smoothly. Smells good. I love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I've had a fantastic experience using the Vaseline Radiant X Deep Nourishment Body Cream. The combination of 100% pure shea butter, coconut oil, vitamin C, and peptides does wonders for my skin. It leaves my skin feeling incredibly soft and moisturized without any greasy residue. Plus, it has a pleasant and not-too-overpowering scent. I also appreciate the practical packaging, making it easy to use just the right amount. I've noticed my skin looks more radiant and feels healthier since I started using this cream. It's become a must-have in my skincare routine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This lotion is light and still very moisturizing!! It smells amazing and don’t feel sticky! Will be being again when I run out!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome hand, feet or whole body moisture cream!
reviews.reviewText: I got this after seeing a tik tok about a "favorite things" Christmas party. I am not one to usually use lotion because I hate that oily greasy feeling when I don't feel like it did a thing after it soaked in. This stuff... first the price is amazing! The tub is HUGE! This soaks into your skin fast, no greasy feeling...and an hour later my skin looks and feels soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I finally found a body cream that works and smells great. The scent isn’t too overpowering and it feels great! I have this on auto-ship and I tel like that it’s not too thick. I recommend this product to anyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars NIVEA Cocoa Butter Body Cream -- Best Cocoa Cream in the market
reviews.reviewText: Leaves my skin looking healthy and glowing. It is thick and rich without feeling heavy. My skin stays hydrated, soft, and shining. Have used other brands of Cocoa Butter Cream but this is the best so far!
I get dey skin the most in the winter. And I’ve tried Aveeno , Vaseline, but Nivea has always worked the best! Especially after showers my skin is super sensitive. Big jar, for a reasonable price.
Crema molto buono mi piace molto

Have been using it from 1 year it is great and if ur especially oily skin u should use a little amount but if dry go for it or if dry and some parts oily use a little amount mine is combination skin . But total it is a great product but i would recommend go for cocoa butter lotion it a very heigh rate yes but u will never fine a lotion as great as that .
